ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Exploration Mode
ModMetaData.author: TheLastBulletBender
ModMetaData.description:
Why is it that your lost and naked pawns know about the locations of every faction bases and landmark on the planet? Want to have a challenging experience exploring the planet for the first time? Rimworld Exploration mode now adds immersive exploration to your game.
Mod Features: Unexplored tiles and world-level fog-of-war. River-crossing movement penalty. Sight penalty over difficult terrain. Pawns drops maps revealing unknown locations. Satellite Hacking (simple Implementation for now)
Supported Mods: VE Outpost Rim War
Future Plans: Integration with other mods that requires you to actually launch Satellites. Reveal locations through prisoner interrogation or recruitment.
